cause.description:
Our international reputation as a healing center for children from birth to age 21 was created by the compassionate people and doctors who have touched so many lives through these many years. From classroom-based programs to sophisticated laboratory research, no other organization comes close to providing the state-of-the-art equipment, array of pediatric specialists and all-inclusive care that makes Le Bonheur such a valuable regional resource. Parents seek out our special brand of care for their children, routinely traveling from more than 95 counties in six states.
Le Bonheur is currently raising $100 million dollars to build a state-of-the-art facility. The hospital will be a 12-story tower with over 1 million square feet of space to serve more than 130,000 children each year.
1. To provide the highest quality healthcare for all children.
2. To raise $100 million to build a new Le Bonheur for generations of children to come.
3. To be nationally and internationally recognized as a center of excellence in neuroscience, specializing in Brain Tumors and Epilepsy.
cause.mission: In partnership with our physicians, to be the leader in children's health care in the Mid-South through high quality patient care, research and advocacy.
cause.name: Le Bonheur Children's Hospital
